A Familiar Face Walkthrough

The quest begins in the Lower City within Baldur's Gate. Players can reach this destination in Act 3. Shadowheart will remember an old friend and this quest only has one objective: Find Shadowheart's old friend.

This quest can also be triggered in Act 1 if you successfully persuade Shadowheart to consume the Noblestalk. (quest Find the Mushroom Picker)
